verses.verse: And I saw <WG1492> in the right <WG1188> hand of him that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne <WG2362> a book <WG975> written <WG1125> within <WG2081> and on <WG1909> the backside, <WG3693> sealed <WG2696> with seven <WG2033> seals. <WG4973>

And I saw <WG1492> a strong <WG2478> angel <WG32> proclaiming <WG2784> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> Who <WG5101> is worthy <WG514> to open <WG455> the book, <WG975> and to loose <WG3089> the seals <WG4973> thereof? <WG846>

And no <WG3762> man <WG3762> in heaven, <WG3772> nor <WG3761> in earth, <WG1093> neither <WG3761> under <WG5270> the earth, <WG1093> was able <WG1410> to open <WG455> the book, <WG975> neither <WG3761> to look <WG991> thereon. <WG846>

And I wept <WG2799> much, <WG4183> because <WG3754> no <WG3762> man <WG3762> was found <WG2147> worthy <WG514> to open <WG455> and to read <WG314> the book, <WG975> neither <WG3777> to look <WG991> thereon. <WG846>

And one <WG1520> of the elders <WG4245> said <WG3004> to me, Weep <WG2799> not: behold, <WG2400> the Lion <WG3023> of the tribe <WG5443> of Juda, <WG2455> the Root <WG4491> of David, <WG1138> has prevailed <WG3528> to open <WG455> the book, <WG975> and to loose <WG3089> the seven <WG2033> seals <WG4973> thereof. <WG846>

And I beheld, <WG1492> and, see, <WG2400> in the middle <WG3319> of the throne <WG2362> and of the four <WG5064> beasts, <WG2226> and in the middle <WG3319> of the elders, <WG4245> stood <WG2476> a Lamb <WG721> as it had been slain, <WG4969> having <WG2192> seven <WG2033> horns <WG2768> and seven <WG2033> eyes, <WG3788> which <WG3739> are the seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> of God <WG2316> sent <WG649> forth <WG649> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the earth. <WG1093>
And he came <WG2064> and took <WG4327> the book <WG975> out of the right <WG1188> hand of him that sat <WG2521> on the throne. <WG2362>

And when <WG3753> he had taken <WG2983> the book, <WG975> the four <WG5064> beasts <WG2226> and four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245> fell <WG4098> down before <WG1799> the Lamb, <WG721> having <WG2192> every <WG1538> one of them harps, <WG2788> and golden <WG5552> vials <WG5357> full <WG1073> of odors, <WG2368> which <WG3739> are the prayers <WG4335> of saints. <WG40>

And they sung <WG103> a new <WG2537> song, <WG5603> saying, <WG3004> You are <WG1488> worthy <WG514> to take <WG2983> the book, <WG975> and to open <WG455> the seals <WG4973> thereof: <WG846> for you were slain, <WG4969> and have redeemed <WG59> us to God <WG2316> by your blood <WG129> out of every <WG3956> kindred, <WG5443> and tongue, <WG1100> and people, <WG2992> and nation; <WG1484>
And have made <WG4160> us to our God <WG2316> kings <WG935> and priests: <WG2409> and we shall reign <WG936> on <WG1909> the earth. <WG1093>

And I beheld, <WG1492> and I heard <WG191> the voice <WG5456> of many <WG4183> angels <WG32> round <WG2943> about <WG2943> the throne <WG2362> and the beasts <WG2226> and the elders: <WG4245> and the number <WG706> of them was ten <WG3461> thousand <WG3461> times ten <WG3461> thousand, <WG3461> and thousands <WG5505> of thousands; <WG5505>

Saying <WG3004> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> Worthy <WG514> is the Lamb <WG721> that was slain <WG4969> to receive <WG2983> power, <WG1411> and riches, <WG4149> and wisdom, <WG4678> and strength, <WG2479> and honor, <WG5092> and glory, <WG1391> and blessing. <WG2129>

And every <WG3956> creature <WG2938> which <WG3739> is in heaven, <WG3772> and on <WG1722> the earth, <WG1093> and under <WG5270> the earth, <WG1093> and such as are in the sea, <WG2281> and all <WG3956> that are in them, heard <WG191> I saying, <WG3004> Blessing, <WG2129> and honor, <WG5092> and glory, <WG1391> and power, <WG2904> be to him that sits <WG2521> on the throne, <WG2362> and to the Lamb <WG721> for ever <WG165> and ever. <WG165>

And the four <WG5064> beasts <WG2226> said, <WG3004> Amen. <WG281> And the four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245> fell <WG4098> down and worshipped <WG4352> him that lives <WG2198> for ever <WG165> and ever. <WG165>
